successes.title: Forge Solid KILO: Denser than solid uranium
successes.description: Introducing the KILO CUBE by Forge Solid.  Geometrically perfect, it's crafted from 1 kg of aerospace grade Tungsten (W).

Pledges.description:
THE MINI CUBE EARLY BIRD
A 1/2" cube of 95% pure tungsten.  The perfect entry into the world of density. Free USA shipping!

THE MINI CUBE REGULAR BIRD
A 1/2" cube of 95% pure tungsten.  The perfect entry into the world of density. Free USA shipping!

THE MINI 2 PACK (2)
Two (2) 1/2" cubes of 95% pure tungsten.  The perfect entry pair into the world of density. Free USA shipping!

THE CUBE EARLY BIRD
A 1" cube of 95% pure tungsten.  Unbelievable strength and heft.  A perfect piece of one of the rarest, densest metals. Free USA shipping!

THE CUBE REGULAR BIRD
A 1" cube of 95% pure tungsten.  Unbelievable strength and heft.  A perfect piece of one of the rarest, densest metals. Free USA shipping!

THE PERFECT PAIR
Two cubes! 1" cube + 1/2" cube of 95% pure tungsten.  Unbelievable strength and heft.  A perfect piece of one of the rarest, densest metals. Free USA shipping!

THE CUBE TWO PACK (2)
Two (2) 1" cubes of 95% pure tungsten.  Unbelievable strength and heft.  A perfect piece of one of the rarest, densest metals. Free USA shipping!

THE MINI CUBE TEN PACK
TEN (10) 1/2" cubes of 95% pure tungsten.  Perfect for classrooms or gifts! Free USA shipping!

THE -  KILO  -  EARLY BIRD
A 3.8 cm (1.5") cube of 95% pure tungsten weighing in at exactly 1000 grams (2.2 pounds) in an mind-bendingly small package. Handle with care! Free USA shipping!

THE -  KILO  -  Regular Bird
A 3.8 cm (1.5") cube of 95% pure tungsten weighing in at exactly 1000 grams (2.2 pounds) in an mind-bendingly small package. Handle with care! Free USA shipping!

THE STACK - THREE CUBES
The KILO tower of power!  3 cubes of 95% pure tungsten. You will receive: one (1) 1/2" cube, one (1) 1" cube, and one (1) 1.5" KILO cube! Free USA shipping!

THE CUBE FIVE PACK (5)
Five (5) 1" cubes of 95% pure tungsten.  Unbelievable strength and heft.  A perfect piece of one of the rarest, densest metals. Free USA shipping!

GIGANTICA
A 2" cube of 95% pure tungsten.  Over 5 pounds (2.37kg) in an mind-bendingly small package. Handle with extreme care! Free USA shipping!

THE CUBE TEN PACK (10)
Ten (10) 1" cubes of 95% pure tungsten.  Unbelievable strength and heft.  A perfect piece of one of the rarest, densest metals. Free USA shipping!

SNOWMAN - THREE CUBES
The perfect aesthetic arrangement.  3 cubes of 95% pure tungsten. You will receive: one (1) 1/2" cube, one (1) 1" cube, and one (1) 2" cube gigantica! Unbelievable strength and heft. A perfect piece of one of the rarest, densest metals.
Over 5 pounds (2.37kg) in an mind-bendingly small package. Handle with extreme care! Free USA shipping!
